snippet.title: Infectonator 3: Apocalypse Trailer
snippet.description:
Who needs humanity anyway? Infectonator 3: Apocalypse is a frantic pixelart indie arcade sim coming soon to Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/666570/Infectonator_3_Apocalypse/
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1438762769

When there is no more room in Hell, the dead will walk the Earth. Also explode on it. Barf on it. Do creepy clown things on it. Well... if the world has to end, it might as well be weird, right? Infectonator 3: Apocalypse is an action-packed game with a dark sense of humor that puts you in front of a zombie apocalypse. Drop your virus in locations around the world and watch the mayhem unfold, taking down bizarre world leaders, upgrading and expanding your undead army with unique units, but beware... humanity is researching a cure, and they won't go quietly.
